Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yakky-tan, where are you going this early in the morning?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Doesn't really matter. We're going on holiday for a while.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The fact that you can't even tell Yoshino means it's all very fishy~~

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Even though it's your day off, you're dressed rather properly, are you on a date with Shashou? Did you have a boyfriend?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's silly, a boyfriend? I'm just going out with Bestyakh to the town.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh~ Bestyakh. That younger sister who looks just like Yakky-tan. She completed her sentence in Oshioki Prison.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: She's not used to the streets of St. Iris yet, I'll have to guide her. I'm sure there's... a lot of things to buy.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Oh, speaking of Oshioki Prison, there's a problem child who was released at about the same time as Bestyakh, and she's looking for you.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Who? Yoshino doesn't recall to have any acquaintances with problem children.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: There's one you know. A Nishikese but no beast ears and tail, she specifically requested Yoshino to guide her through the dormitories of the SSS.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Someone without ears and tails...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Do you mean that person with fake ears and a tail?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: See her with your own eyes. I told you where her cell is already.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooh, oooooh--!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, Putra♪ This time try on this outfit♪

Name: Putra
Phrase: Eh~? there's still more ah? I'll just pick the first one I tried on~

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What are you talking about? You requested for a full course Vivienne Coordinator routine you know? You have to try everything on until I'm satisfied.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Vivienne's choice of clothes have too much fabric. Can't you find something closer to a swimming costume?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: No, I don't have any clothes like that! Besides, you keep sticking out your tummy, Putra, it's high time you were something more fashionable like frilly dresses. Stop complaining and go to the fitting room!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Riiight~

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Heheh, I'll let the Flamarinian girls know how cute you are♪

Name: Mary
Phrase: Although I couldn't save you, I can come and see you this way once in a while.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I hear that there will be a memorial in the town centre. I wonder if the Knights of the Order and the Allied Forces will hold a ceremony every year to mark the occasion.

Name: Mary
Phrase: But I know you don't like that sort of thing. I thought it would be best to make your cemetery in a quiet place like this.

Name: Mary
Phrase: This is the most beautiful place in St. Iris to enjoy scenery - You told me that. It's your favourite place to meet up with friends.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The place with the best view of St. Iris? I didn't realise Ricardo had left the royal castle to visit such a place.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes. She was even more of a troublemaker than Islington, she couldn't sit still in a safe place at all, said it'll kill her.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What are you going to do now, Mary? Lady Islington said you could go back to the Knights of the Order.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I am always St. Irish, I could be a member of the Order of the Knights. However, I will refuse important posts such as Knight Commander or Squad Leader. I'll just going to continue as an Out-Sider and do as I please.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: ...Are you going to go away again?

Name: Mary
Phrase: I've been wandering around, but I think I've had enough of travelling on my own.

Name: Mary
Phrase: There are things I need to find out about the Giant Trees in other countries too, but the best way to do that is to work together with Conductor.

Name: Mary
Phrase: And Ricardo asked me to do it. He asked me to look after her son and his friends.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: So you're going to be a member of the SSS, then?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes, I think so.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I see...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary Rosegarden, I have a request to make of you, as a knight of St. Iris.

Name: Mary
Phrase: What is it?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I request you to teach me swordsmanship. I want you to teach me how to fight and think in a way that will work in the outside world. I will endure even the most rigorous training.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Can you tell me why you chose me as your teacher?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Because I want to be a knight who protects the Divine Child.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I still can't surpass you. Back when Sir Conductor released the Guardian of the Giant Tree, you were the one next to him, not me.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But I want to stand where you stand someday. I want to change this world that forces Divine Children to be sacrificed. I want to be a knight who protects the Divine Child, protects the people, and be a knight who can face reality.

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Good answer. Provided your studies and duties are not in the way, I will teach you.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes! Thank you very much!

Name: Mary
Phrase: Now, it's time to go back. It looks like I'm going to have to sleep in your dormitory from today onwards.

Name: Mary
Phrase: This presence is...!

Name: Mary
Phrase: I see. The best thing about her is that she's very tenacious.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary? Is something wrong?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Nothing. I just thought I saw a doll there.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Wait!? Don't tell me there's steel dolls?

Name: Mary
Phrase: You can't compare that junk with what I'm talking about. Anyways, Queensway. Next time I'll tell you some tales about Nishikese dolls.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes, I want to hear it.

Name: Mary
Phrase: It wasn't so bad travelling with a Divine Child, was it? Let's meet again sometime, somewhere.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Don't be stupid. I've had enough of the Divine Children of St. Iris. Also... the Mist Train's too fast, how can ya even expect me to catch up to it?

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: But sometime it is. Take care, Mary.
Finally, we're outside the Gate. If I recall, this Metro Hole is connected to the surface, right?
So this is the Iris Cloud. It's just like the legends, the sky's really high...
First, we must meet the Divine Child of St. Iris. We must begin by having her recognised as an emissary of Iris Metro.
The surface dwellers of Iris Cloud don't know about the existence of Metro, do they? Ugh, I wonder if they will believe us...?
The Divine Children of Iris Cloud is a chosen bloodline with special powers. If we show them our power, they will surely believe us.
But if they don't believe us, we will be in trouble. Our subterranean world - Iris Metro's Giant Tree, we really need their help to save it...
